tweaks.title: Hide "Related" Stories and Pages
tweaks.description: When you click a link from the news feed or Like a page post, Facebook inserts a block of other things you might like. Enable this Tweak to hide those blocks.

tweaks.title: Hide Notification Bubble
tweaks.description: When a new notification is added, it is displayed in the lower left corner. Enable this tweak to hide it.  Updated 2022-08-20, supports 2020 & 2022 layouts.

tweaks.title: Force Chat Popup To Default Colors
tweaks.description: Chat colors can be customized by people in the chat, causing the popups to be different colors. This tweak restores all chat popup panels to the default blue color.

tweaks.title: Remove Status Background Colors
tweaks.description: Facebook users may choose a colored or image background for their posts.  This tweak removes the background and returns such posts to normal plain text.  Updated 2022-08-22, supports 2020 & 2022 layouts.

tweaks.title: Improved Hide/Show interface & tooltips
tweaks.description: Improve Hide/Show Parts of the Page user interface & tooltips

tweaks.title: Fix date-stamp blobs (v1.2a; NOT NEEDED in SFx 28 or 29)
tweaks.description: This fix should not be needed in Social Fixer 28.0 or newer.  You can disable it, test, then remove it if all goes well.  Please report in the Support Group (in wrench menu) if the date blobs come back.  Users of older SFx releases may still find this useful.  Updated 2022-10-14, supports 2020 through late-2022 layouts.

tweaks.title: Fix stray Social Fixer menus (NOT NEEDED in SFx 29)
tweaks.description: This fixes a bug in SFx 28.0, in which a small square of menus showing 'Filter Debugger' and/or 'Post Data' appear on the left side of the screen.  The bug will be fixed in next release.
tweaks.css:
/* hide extra, floating Social Fixer PAI menus
**
** Version 1.2, 2022-03-16
**
** This corrects a display bug in Social Fixer 28.0
**
** The bug causes extra post-wrench and/or post-funnel (Post Action
** Icon, PAI) menus to appear in the upper left corner of the page.
**
** This bug is fixed in future SFx code; then this won't be needed.
**
** NOTE: if you have a tweak with:   [id^=jsc_c_][role='tooltip']
**       please disable it!  It hides important parts of Facebook.
*/

.sfx_post_action_menu:not([style*=right]){left:-4000px;right:4000px;}
